chapters.title: Introduction to Geometry
chapters.summary: Learn the basic concepts and terminology of geometry, including points, lines, and planes.

pages.title: Points, Lines, and Planes
pages.body: Understand the foundational elements of geometry: points, lines, and planes...

pages.title: Line Segments and Rays
pages.body: Learn the differences between line segments and rays, and how to represent them...

pages.title: Understanding Angles
pages.body: Explore the concept of angles, including how to measure them in degrees...

pages.title: Types of Angles
pages.body: Learn about different types of angles, such as acute, obtuse, right, and straight angles...

pages.title: Parallel and Perpendicular Lines
pages.body: Learn the characteristics of parallel and perpendicular lines, and how to identify them...

pages.title: Angle Relationships
pages.body: Explore angle relationships, such as complementary, supplementary, and vertical angles...

chapters.title: Triangles
chapters.summary: Dive into the study of triangles, including types, properties, and theorems.

pages.title: Classifying Triangles by Sides
pages.body: Learn about different types of triangles based on their sides: equilateral, isosceles, and scalene...

pages.title: Classifying Triangles by Angles
pages.body: Explore the classification of triangles based on their angles: acute, obtuse, and right triangles...

pages.title: The Pythagorean Theorem
pages.body: Understand the Pythagorean Theorem and how it applies to right triangles...

pages.title: Triangle Inequality Theorem
pages.body: Learn about the triangle inequality theorem and its implications for the sides of a triangle...

pages.title: Congruent Triangles
pages.body: Explore the concept of congruence and the criteria for triangles to be congruent...

pages.title: Similar Triangles
pages.body: Learn about similar triangles, including the criteria for similarity and applications...

chapters.title: Quadrilaterals and Polygons
chapters.summary: Study the properties of quadrilaterals and other polygons.

pages.title: Types of Quadrilaterals
pages.body: Learn about different types of quadrilaterals, such as squares, rectangles, parallelograms, and trapezoids...

pages.title: Properties of Quadrilaterals
pages.body: Explore the properties of various quadrilaterals, including angle sums and side relationships...

pages.title: Introduction to Polygons
pages.body: Understand what polygons are, including the definition and classification by the number of sides...

pages.title: Regular and Irregular Polygons
pages.body: Learn the differences between regular and irregular polygons, and how to calculate their interior and exterior angles...

pages.title: Calculating Perimeter
pages.body: Learn how to calculate the perimeter of various polygons...

pages.title: Calculating Area
pages.body: Understand how to calculate the area of common polygons, including triangles, quadrilaterals, and regular polygons...

chapters.title: Circles
chapters.summary: Explore the properties of circles, including circumference, area, and theorems involving chords, tangents, and arcs.

pages.title: Parts of a Circle
pages.body: Learn about the different parts of a circle, including radius, diameter, chord, arc, and sector...

pages.title: Circumference and Area
pages.body: Understand how to calculate the circumference and area of a circle using formulas...

pages.title: Central and Inscribed Angles
pages.body: Explore the properties of central and inscribed angles, and how they relate to the arcs they intercept...

pages.title: Angle Relationships in Circles
pages.body: Learn about angle relationships in circles, such as angles formed by tangents and chords...

pages.title: Chord Properties
pages.body: Understand the properties of chords in a circle, including the perpendicular bisector theorem...

pages.title: Tangent Properties
pages.body: Explore the properties of tangents, including the tangent-secant theorem...

chapters.title: Transformations
chapters.summary: Learn about geometric transformations, including translations, rotations, reflections, and dilations.

pages.title: Understanding Translations
pages.body: Learn how to move a shape from one location to another without changing its size or orientation...

pages.title: Performing Translations
pages.body: Practice translating shapes on a coordinate plane...

pages.title: Understanding Rotations
pages.body: Explore how to rotate shapes around a fixed point by a certain angle...

pages.title: Performing Rotations
pages.body: Practice rotating shapes on a coordinate plane by different angles...

pages.title: Understanding Reflections
pages.body: Learn how to reflect shapes across a line to create a mirror image...

pages.title: Identifying Symmetry
pages.body: Understand the concept of symmetry and how to identify lines of symmetry in different shapes...

pages.title: Understanding Dilations
pages.body: Learn how to resize shapes while keeping their proportions consistent...

pages.title: Performing Dilations
pages.body: Practice dilating shapes on a coordinate plane and understanding scale factors...

chapters.title: Coordinate Geometry
chapters.summary: Study the relationship between algebra and geometry through the coordinate plane.

pages.title: Plotting Points
pages.body: Learn how to plot points on the coordinate plane using ordered pairs...

pages.title: Distance Formula
pages.body: Understand how to calculate the distance between two points using the distance formula...

pages.title: Understanding Slope
pages.body: Explore the concept of slope and how it describes the steepness of a line...

pages.title: Equations of Lines
pages.body: Learn about the different forms of linear equations, including slope-intercept and point-slope forms...

sections.title: Midpoint and Partitioning a Line Segment

pages.title: Midpoint Formula
pages.body: Learn how to find the midpoint of a line segment using the midpoint formula...

pages.title: Partitioning a Segment
pages.body: Understand how to divide a line segment into a given ratio using coordinate geometry...
